HTML.question: Which tag is used to create a hyperlink in HTML?
What does the DOCTYPE declaration in HTML do?
choices: Specifies the version of HTML in use
Defines the document type and structure
Declares a document to be HTML5

HTML.question: In HTML, which attribute is used to specify an alternate text for an image if it cannot be displayed?
What does the HTML tag <em> represent?
Which HTML element is used to define the structure of an HTML document?
What is the purpose of the HTML <meta> tag?
choices: Defines metadata about an HTML document

HTML.question: Which HTML element is used to define a table?

CSS.question: Which CSS property is used for changing the text color of an element?
What does the 'box-sizing' property do in CSS?
choices: Defines the size of the box
Specifies whether the padding should be included in the total width/height of the element
Sets the border style of the box
Adjusts the transparency of the box

CSS.question: Which CSS selector targets all elements of a specific type?
In CSS, what is the purpose of the 'z-index' property?
choices: Defines the zoom level of an element
Sets the order of the stacking context
Adjusts the opacity of an element
Specifies the background color of an element

CSS.question: What is the default value of the 'position' property in CSS?
Which CSS property is used to control the space between elements?
What does the 'float' property in CSS do?
choices: Positions an element to the left or right with text flowing around it
Sets the opacity of an element
Changes the font style of an element

CSS.question: Which CSS property is used to create rounded corners?
What does the 'display: none;' property do in CSS?
choices: Displays the element with no styling
Sets the element to full width
Applies a border to the element
